Clyde Woods
===========

E-mail:

[Contact Clyde Woods](https://www.fairfieldtexas.com/user/109/contact)

Phone:

(903) 389-2633

### Biography

Clyde hired in with the City of Fairfield on March 14, 2005. He has a Class "A" Water License and a Class "A" Wastewater License, along with being certified as a Customer Service Inspector. The Public Works Utility Division is responsible for the maintenance of the City’s water and wastewater infrastructure. This includes four water wells, two water treatment plants,10 lift stations in the City limits, two main lift stations, and a 1.5 million gallons a day wastewater treatment plant that serves the City of Fairfield, a 200,000-gallon package plant that serves the Boyd Unit and two water wells with a water treatment plant located about five miles outside the City limits. The city is also responsible for the Westwood Water Utility, consisting of five water wells and over 450 customers.
